Vivillon (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0665: Spewpa
Pokémon
#0667: Litleo →

Vivillon has been featured on 7 different cards since it debuted in the XY expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Vivillon cards are normally Grass-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Vivillon

Vivillon
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Vivillon XY 17/146 Collection X 008/060
        Collection X 008/060
XY 17/146        
Vivillon BREAKthrough 15/162 Blue Shock 008/059
Vivillon XY Black Star Promos   XY137 XY-P Promotional cards   165/XY-P
Vivillon Forbidden Light 8/131 Forbidden Light 006/094
Vivillon Battle Styles 013/163 Single Strike Master 006/070
Vivillon Scarlet & Violet 010/198 Violet ex 005/078
Vivillon Surging Sparks 007/191 Super Electric Breaker 006/106
Surging Sparks 193/191 Super Electric Breaker 107/106


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
